resources.string: Congrats,you have passed the basic test.\n But, their might be more eligibility checks before you actually donate.
Are you less than 18 years of age?
Is your weight less than 45 kg?
Have you been pregnant or have just given birth?
Do you have a serious heart condition?
Are you at risk for exposure to HIV, the virus that causes AIDS?
Have you had any medicines within the past week?
Have taken the tetanus injection anytime during the last month?
Have undergone a dental surgery (eg. root canal) within the past 6 months?
Have you ever lived with a person with clinical hepatitis B or hepatitis C during the last year?
Have you consumed alcohol or tobacco within the past 24 hours?
